long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Portal Network resolves Blockchain domains to IPFS and redirects your browser to content.

The extension help you to connect to the blockchain website, such as Ethereum(.eth) and redirect to the content on IPFS.

Portal Network will browse to all blockchain content by domain names.

Try "blog.portalnetwork.eth" by entering in your browser's address bar to see our blog website.
